title: Map Sampler, 1939
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem, chain, couching, satin, running, knotted and back stitches on 8 harness satin foundation; counted stitches
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: The globe shown in two hemispheres, showing the flights of Colonel and Mrs. Lindberg in 1931, 1933 and 1937. There are scenes in each corner labeled S. America, Africa, China, and India.  At the bottom center, there is a plane labeled the Sirius-Tingmissartoq. The entire map is enclosed by a scrolling floral vine.

tombstone.epitaph:
Map Sampler, 1939.
1939. Medium: silk embroidery on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem, chain, couching, satin, running, knotted and back stitches on 8 harness satin foundation; counted stitches. Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection. 1975-81-6.
